original_title: Introspective - Labels And Discrimination Within The LGBTQ Community
overview: â€œIntrospective is a documentary that focuses on labels and discrimination within the LGBTQ community, featuring the stories of three Atlanta individuals who identify as a part of the LGBTQ community. These braves individual are open enough to discuss the issues of labels and discrimination by the very same community they fight for and are a part of.
title: Introspective - Labels And Discrimination Within The LGBTQ Community
